tell_me_about_yourself: ^Why don't you tell me about yourself?
^Well, I'm a curious and user-oriented developer!
^To me, the exciting work I've enjoyed is-
^I strongly value the creative energy of people excitedly-
^- bouncing off of each other's ideas.
^There are many talented people out there with-
^- valuable perspectives that I don't have.
^- I've found you can create some really awesome stuff.
^One could argue that I gave you some new perspective.
^Now with that pesky window out of the way you can now hear-
^and smell the beautiful world hidden behind that window tint!
^That's great... I'll be sure to enjoy the smells and sounds.
^Especially, when I'm trying to sleep and there's a draft blowing.
do_for_fun: ^What do you like to do for fun?
^I tend to get sucked into a lot of different hobbies.
^Video games are a big part of my life.
^When I find time, I also love to do game development.
^But there's a lot of things to experience out there!
^Hiking, learning instruments, taking care of my cats,
^cooking, and recently I've been enjoying bouldering!
^What do you like to do for fun, Recruiter?
^The Recruiter goes on a passionate tirade about her hobbies.
^Including the time she: volunteered and served 1000 bagels to the needy.
^When she narrowly won her local municipal's pickleball tournament.
^When she bravely lent her Ferrari to the president of the U.S.
^Although, you suspect that last one is likely a fib.
work_experience: ^What kind of work experience do you have?
repair_window: ^So... how much will that window cost to fix?
^You're not going to pay to fix it are you?
